featured.text: The organization believes that people may be motivated to buy elephant-friendly brands when they know more about the risk tea can pose to these endangered animals.

definition.zh_def: 瀕臨絕種的，指某種動植物的數量極少，面臨滅絕的風險。
definition.en_def: At risk of extinction; referring to a species whose population is very low and declining.
definition.example: The giant panda is an endangered species that needs protection.
